rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall designed to welcome guests and allow for smooth transition into the home.

rooms.name: Lobby/Waiting Area
rooms.description: Spacious area with built-in seating and display shelves, following traditional Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Large dining space adjoining the kitchen for family gatherings. Designed to promote a sense of unity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped, traditional Kerala-style kitchen with modern amenities, designed for efficiency and functionality while maintaining cultural essence.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Semi-open living space that flows into the garden area. Decorated with local art and textures, offering a blend of tradition and modernity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony for enjoying fresh air. Placed in the north-eastern part to maximize positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with its own balcony, offering privacy and a pleasant view.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: North-facing entrance designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony Windows (Master Bedroom)
openings.description: Large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation for the master bedroom.

openings.name: Balcony Windows (Guest Bedroom)
openings.description: Spacious balcony with extensive views, offering comfort and a breezy outlook.

openings.name: Interior Doorways
openings.description: Smooth transitions between rooms maintaining an open layout in adherence to Kerala's traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: A duplex studio apartment with integrated living and sleeping area, featuring a separate balcony for ample sunlight.

openings.name: Upper Floor Balconies
openings.description: Balconies designed to overlook the garden, ensuring natural light and proper ventilation.

openings.name: Interior Staircase
openings.description: A secure and spacious staircase connecting ground floor and upper studio apartment.

plot.description: The design incorporates a large garden around the structure, emphasizing a connection with nature and adherence to Vastu principles by ensuring proper natural light and ventilation.
